result.title: This Olympian Wept as She Realized She'd Won Her Country's First-Ever Gold Medal
result.desc: Though this was Majlinda Kelmendi’s second Olympics, it was a historical first for both her and Kosovo, the country she was representing: Kelmendi’s 52kg judo victory against Italy’s Odette Giufredda earned her Kosovo’s first-ever gold medal, CNN reports.

result.title: Here's what happens to JC Penney when Sears, Macy's close stores
result.desc: On a call with analysts following the company's fiscal second-quarter earnings report , CEO Marvin Ellison said the department store's sales have seen a lift in malls where a Sears (NASDAQ: SHLD) has closed. As of April 30, Sears said it had closed 75 stores over past two years.

result.title: Reality star Trump seems to be facing reality
result.desc: Barring something crazy happening, Donald Trump is going to lose in November — probably quite badly — and it appears Trump may be starting to realize this.

result.title: If you eat bananas for breakfast, we have some bummer news
result.desc: “Bananas eaten alone aren’t the best option because they’re 25% sugar and moderately acidic,” Gioffre said, noting that adding something with a healthy fat might make them a little bit healthier.
